short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the outfit of any Roblox user to your own avatar with the click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to copy the outfit of a ROBLOX user when you go on their profile! Simply navigate to a user you like and click 'Copy'. If they have paid items, you can also toggle opening the tabs for the items they don't have, otherwise if they are free, it will buy them automatically for you.
